cards.name: Humble Castle
cards.description:
Worth $1
----------
Worth 1VP per Castle you have.

cards.name: Crumbling Castle
cards.description:
1VP
----------
When you gain or trash this, +1VP and gain a Silver.

cards.name: Small Castle
cards.description:
Trash this or a Castle from your hand. If you do, gain a Castle.
----------
2VP

cards.name: Haunted Castle
cards.description:
2VP
----------
When you gain this during your turn, gain a Gold, and each other player with 5 or more cards in hand puts 2 cards from their hand onto their deck.

cards.name: Opulent Castle
cards.description:
Discard any number of Victory cards. +$2 per card discarded.
----------
3VP

cards.name: Sprawling Castle
cards.description:
4VP
----------
When you gain this, gain a Duchy or 3 Estates.

cards.name: Grand Castle
cards.description:
5VP
----------
When you gain this, reveal your hand. +1VP per Victory card in your hand and/or in play.

cards.name: King's Castle
cards.description: Worth 2VP per Castle you have.

cards.name: Advance
cards.description: You may trash an Action card from your hand. If you do, gain an Action card costing up to $6.

cards.name: Triumph
cards.description: Gain an Estate. If you did, +1VP per card you've gained this turn.

cards.name: Annex
cards.description: Look through your discard pile. Choose up to 5 cards from it and shuffle the rest into your deck. Gain a Duchy.

cards.name: Donate
cards.description: After this turn, put all cards from your deck and discard pile into your hand, trash any number, shuffle your hand into your deck, then draw 5 cards.

cards.name: Delve
cards.description:
+1 Buy
Gain a Silver.

cards.name: Tax
cards.description:
Add 2Debt to a Supply pile.
Setup: Add 1Debt to each Supply pile. When a player buys a card, they take the Debt from its pile.

cards.name: Banquet
cards.description: Gain two Coppers and a non-Victory card costing up to $5.

cards.name: Ritual
cards.description: Gain a Curse. If you do, trash a card from your hand. +1VP per $1 it cost.

cards.name: Salt the Earth
cards.description:
+1VP
Trash a Victory card from the Supply.

cards.name: Wedding
cards.description:
+1VP
Gain a Gold.

cards.name: Windfall
cards.description: If your deck and discard pile are empty, gain 3 Golds.

cards.name: Conquest
cards.description: Gain 2 Silvers. +1VP per Silver you've gained this turn.

cards.name: Dominate
cards.description: Gain a Province. If you do, +9VP.

cards.name: Engineer
cards.description: Gain a card costing up to $4. You may trash this. If you do, gain a card costing up to $4.

cards.name: City Quarter
cards.description:
+2 Actions
Reveal your hand. +1 Card per Action card revealed.

cards.name: Overlord
cards.description: Play a non-Command Action card from the Supply costing up to $5, leaving it there.

cards.name: Royal Blacksmith
cards.description:
+5 Cards
Reveal your hand; discard the Coppers.

cards.name: Encampment/Plunder
cards.description: Include the Encampment/Plunder pile.

cards.name: Patrician/Emporium
cards.description: Include the Patrician/Emporium pile.

cards.name: Settlers/Bustling Village
cards.description: Include the Settlers/Bustling Village pile.

cards.name: Castles
cards.description: Sort the castle pile by cost, putting the more expensive Castles on the bottom. For a 2-player game, us only one of each Castle. Only the top card of the pile can be gained or bought.

cards.name: Catapult/Rocks
cards.description: Include the Catapult/Rocks pile.

cards.name: Chariot Race
cards.description:
+1 Action
Reveal the top card of your deck and put it into your hand. The player to your left reveals the top card of their deck. If your card costs more, +$1 and +1VP.

cards.name: Enchantress
cards.description:
Until your next turn, the first time each other player plays an Action card on their turn, they get +1 Card and +1 Action instead of following its instructions.
At the start of your next turn, +2 Cards.

cards.name: Farmers' Market
cards.description:
+1 Buy
If there are 4VP or more on the Farmers' Market Supply pile, take them and trash this. Otherwise, add 1VP to the pile and then +$1 per 1VP on the pile.

cards.name: Gladiator/Fortune
cards.description: Include the Gladiator/Fortune pile.

cards.name: Sacrifice
cards.description:
Trash a card from your hand. If it's an...
Action card, +2 Cards, +2 Actions
Treasure card, +$2
Victory card, +2VP

cards.name: Temple
cards.description:
+1VP
Trash from 1 to 3 differently named cards from your hand. Add 1VP to the Temple Supply pile.
----------
When you gain this, take the VP from the Temple Supply pile.

cards.name: Villa
cards.description:
+2 Actions
+1 Buy
+$1
----------
When you gain this, put it into your hand, +1 Action, and if it's your Buy phase return to your Action phase.

cards.name: Archive
cards.description:
+1 Action
Set aside the top 3 cards of your deck face down (you may look at them). Now and at the start of your next two turns, put one into your hand.

cards.name: Capital
cards.description:
Worth $6
+1 Buy
----------
When you discard this from play, take 6Debt, and then you may pay off Debt.

cards.name: Charm
cards.description: Choose one: +1 Buy and +$2; or the next time you gain a card this turn, you may also gain a differently named card with the same cost.

cards.name: Crown
cards.description:
If it's your Action phase, you may play an Action from your hand twice.
If it's your Buy phase, you may play a Treasure from your hand twice.

cards.name: Forum
cards.description:
+3 Cards
+1 Action
Discard 2 cards.
----------
When you buy this, +1 Buy.

cards.name: Groundskeeper
cards.description:
+1 Card
+1 Action
This turn, when you gain a Victory card, +1VP.

cards.name: Legionary
cards.description:
+$3
You may reveal a Gold from your hand. If you do, each other player discards down to 2 cards in hand, then draws a card.

cards.name: Wild Hunt
cards.description: Choose one: +3 Cards and add 1VP to the Wild Hunt Supply pile; or gain an Estate, and if you do, take the VP from the pile.

cards.name: Aqueduct
cards.description:
When you gain a Treasure, move 1VP from its pile to this.
When you gain a Victory card, take the VP from this.
Setup: Put 8VP on the Silver and Gold piles.

cards.name: Arena
cards.description:
At the start of your Buy phase, you may discard an Action card. If you do, take 2VP from here.
Setup: Put 6VP here per player.

cards.name: Bandit Fort
cards.description: When scoring, -2VP for each Silver and each Gold you have.

cards.name: Basilica
cards.description:
When you buy a card, if you have $2 or more left, take 2VP from here.
Setup: Put 6VP here per player.

cards.name: Baths
cards.description:
When you end your turn without having gained a card, take 2VP from here.
Setup: Put 6VP here per player.

cards.name: Battlefield
cards.description:
When you gain a Victory card, take 2VP from here.
Setup: Put 6VP here per player.

cards.name: Colonnade
cards.description:
When you buy an Action card, if you have a copy of it in play, take 2VP from here.
Setup: Put 6VP here per player.

cards.name: Defiled Shrine
cards.description:
When you gain an Action, move 1VP from its pile to this.
When you buy a Curse, take the VP from this.
Setup: Put 2VP on each non-Gathering Action Supply pile.

cards.name: Fountain
cards.description: When scoring, 15VP if you have at least 10 Coppers.

cards.name: Keep
cards.description: When scoring, 5VP per differently named Treasure you have, that you have more copies of than each other player, or tied for most.

cards.name: Labyrinth
cards.description:
When you gain a 2nd card in one of your turns, take 2VP from here.
Setup: Put 6VP here per player.

cards.name: Mountain Pass
cards.description: When you are the first player to gain a Province, after that turn, each player bids once, up to 40Debt, ending with you. High bidder gets +8VP and takes the Debt they bid.

cards.name: Museum
cards.description: When scoring, 2VP per differently named card you have.

cards.name: Obelisk
cards.description:
When scoring, 2VP per card you have from the chosen pile.
Setup: Choose a random Action Supply pile.

cards.name: Orchard
cards.description: When scoring, 4VP per differently named Action card you have 3 or more copies of.

cards.name: Palace
cards.description: When scoring, 3VP per set you have of Copper-Silver-Gold.

cards.name: Tomb
cards.description: When you trash a card, +1VP.

cards.name: Tower
cards.description: When scoring, 1VP per non-Victory card you have from an empty Supply pile.

cards.name: Triumphal Arch
cards.description: When scoring, 3VP per copy you have of the 2nd most common Action card among your cards (if it's a tie, count either).

cards.name: Wall
cards.description: When scoring, -1VP per card you have after the first 15.

cards.name: Wolf Den
cards.description: When scoring, -3VP per card you have exactly one copy of.

cards.name: Encampment
cards.description:
+2 Cards
+2 Actions
You may reveal a Gold or Plunder from your hand. If you do not, set this aside, and return it to the Supply at the start of Clean-up.
(This is the top half of the Encampment/Plunder pile.)

cards.name: Plunder
cards.description:
Worth $2
+1VP
(This is the bottom half of the Encampment/Plunder pile.)

cards.name: Patrician
cards.description:
+1 Card
+1 Action
Reveal the top card of your deck. If it costs $5 or more, put it into your hand.
(This is the top half of the Patrician/Emporium pile.)

cards.name: Emporium
cards.description:
+1 Card
+1 Action
+$1
----------
When you gain this, if you have at least 5 Action cards in play, +2VP.
(This is the bottom half of the Patrician/Emporium pile.)

cards.name: Settlers
cards.description:
+1 Card
+1 Action
Look through your discard pile. You may reveal a Copper from it and put it into your hand.
(This is the top half of the Settlers/Bustling Village pile.)

cards.name: Bustling Village
cards.description:
+1 Card
+3 Actions
Look through your discard pile. You may reveal a Settlers from it and put it into your hand.
(This is the bottom half of the Settlers/Bustling Village pile.)

cards.name: Catapult
cards.description:
+$1
Trash a card from your hand. If it costs $3 or more, each other player gains a Curse. If it's a Treasure, each other player discards down to 3 cards in hand.
(This is the top half of the Catapult/Rocks pile.)

cards.name: Rocks
cards.description:
Worth $1
----------
When you gain or trash this: If it's your Buy phase, gain a Silver on your deck, otherwise gain a Silver to your hand.
(This is the bottom half of the Catapult/Rocks pile.)

cards.name: Gladiator
cards.description:
+$2
Reveal a card from your hand. The player to your left may reveal a copy from their hand. If they do not, +$1 and trash a Gladiator from the Supply.
(This is the top half of the Gladiator/Fortune pile.)

cards.name: Fortune
cards.description:
+1 Buy
When you play this, double your $ if you haven't yet this turn.
----------
When you gain this, gain a Gold per Gladiator you have in play.
(This is the bottom half of the Gladiator/Fortune pile.)
